Package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.CombatZoneCard

package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard.CombatZoneCard
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Model.AdventureCard
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CombatZoneCard
    Represents a Combat Zone card in the game, which is a type of Adventure Card that handles combat encounters.
    CombatZoneState
     
    CombatZoneState_0
    Represents the initial state of a combat zone in the game, responsible for managing the specific mechanics and transitions when the combat zone is first activated.
    CombatZoneState_1
    Represents the first state in the combat zone sequence of the game.
    CombatZoneState_10
    Represents the state of a Combat Zone card at a specific point, identified as "CombatZoneState_10".
    CombatZoneState_3
    Represents the third state in the Combat Zone card's state machine.
    CombatZoneState_5
    Represents the fifth state in a sequence of combat zone states during the game.
    CombatZoneState_6
    Represents the state CombatZoneState_6 in the CombatZoneState context.
    CombatZoneState_7
    Represents the seventh state in the Combat Zone state machine.
    CombatZoneState_8
    Represents the state "CombatZoneState_8" during a combat encounter in the game.
    CombatZoneState_9
    Represents the ninth state in the combat zone sequence during gameplay.
